title: Marshall on help for Europe - cause

content.question: The Marshall Plan most directly resulted from which of the following?

choices.label: A foreign policy based on the collective security of noncommunist nations
A strategy focused on promoting the development of a suburban society
Conservativesâ€™ fears of domestic unrest and challenges to the traditional social order
The effort to create alliances with newly decolonized countries around the world

content.answer: A foreign policy based on the collective security of noncommunist nations

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
